title: Kindred, no new skins, so much opportunity.
body:
Since Riot for whatever reason doesn't want to make any new skins for kindred I thought i'd share some amazing work from other people.

Elderwood
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DDMT_X3XUAALBo_.jpg

Bloodmoon Splash art
http://www.leagueofpictures.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/Blood-Moon-Kindred-League-of-Legends-Fan-Art-140616.jpeg

Dark Star
https://i.redd.it/n4nfhwcvo8vy.png

Death Blossom
https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/001/631/051/large/danielle-oyales-kindred-layout.jpg?1449782011

In Game blood moon
https://i.pinimg.com/originals/f7/10/1b/f7101b5129334348080367f4e2932553.jpg

Riot I hope will make a new kindred skin very soon. My personal favorite is blood moon, but for riot to use a fan made concept is rare, the only one I know that actually happened was blood moon Yasuo. But Blood Moon Kindred is a theme she fits extremely well and I hope she is taken into consideration for the next blood moon line up.

Kindred is one of those champions that almost all skin themes suit them. Personally, I'd love to see the Elderwood line expanded or at least a Blood Moon skin for them during the upcoming event.

1. Zyra got a skin this year
2. Kayn is fairly new
3. Kindred got one about a year and a half ago, which is still a while, but not much compared to some other champions   _coughShencough_

Its true Riot doesn't make skins for these champs often, but they're definitely not just abandoning them.

It's been 4 and some years between Eve's Tango and Safecracker skins.
It's already been just shy over 3 years from Eve's Safecracker skin to now.
Despite Eve having 4 skins, 3 of them are 520 and one is 750 (Safecracker) RP.
she still has a lot of skins and they are all good even if they are cheap

These skins weren't good before her rework.
Safecracker was pretty much the only one with the new model. And her having a rework doesn't refurbish her old as heck skins into new skins magically. She had 2 skin releases in 2009, (Masquerade was first and a few months after, Human (aka Shadow)) and then Tango after a year or so. Four years later was Safecracker.

The point for the low price was that she really was one of the first champions and she practically had no particles to worry about so her 3 skins were pretty much just "recolors". Safecracker changed the model and was priced at 750 RP (which is pretty good IMHO) but it still leaves Eve in a weird spot because she can definitely have a better skin now, that's also more expensive.
her base model is fucking dope,excuse me but she has a hell amount of particles in her kit,rito dint do good enough job on ww's skin as well but no one is complaining

WW skins are awesome.
He also has a lower amount of particles, mostly originating from his fear. He has some swipes and of course, his glowing eyes when he activates bloodscent.

These "new" Eve skins are also awesome, her before rework model was horribly outdated. But it still doesn't change the fact that she hasn't had a skin in years, with gaps of years between skins. That's the reason why i want some justice for Eve and also because i main her so that's a given. She's quickly going down the road where Viktor and Cass were before their skins.

On the side note, i saw on some FB page that there's a rumor on more SG skins and among those are Eve and Cait. I love Star Guardian skin line but i don't particularly care for them in general. They aren't the types of skins i want to own. If this turns out to be true, i'd be pretty disappointed in a _**long awaited**_ skin for Eve, only for it to turn out to be a  Star Guardian. But i'd still begrudgingly buy it from My Shop or wait for a discount/hextech crafting to drop because i want to own all of her skins. It doesn't mean i'd use it at all.

It doesn't even mean the rumored skin itself is going to be bad (subpar), it's just that i don't see how Eve would fit into it except by force. Unless they do her VO to support the skin itself, her whole thing about getting pleasure from pain and suffering of others is directly in conflict of what Star Guardians are supposed to stand for. So the skin itself would have to at least be 1820 RP (if VO is included). If this isn't included, then the skin would feel forced on her just for the sake of giving her a skin.

I'd much rather see a Dark Star Eve or even "Ancient" Eve skin that could Darkin-ify her in some sexy way.

Good Lord.

My personal tastes have no bearing to what's actually being made for Eve, if the rumor for SG Eve is true. And they do matter if i'm putting my money into this game. I didn't make a crying post about something i'm not getting, i discussed why i think SG Eve wouldn't fit if Riot didn't make her a 1820 RP skin because then it would be a mismatch of her thematic and SG thematic.

I don't want a skin for Eve just because she needs a skin and she HAS to fit in somewhere. I want an Eve skin that's in line with who she is in League. Dark Star and "Ancient" Eve ideas do feel like better choices for Eve than a SG skin.

1. I want a new Eve skin
2. I don't want a forced Eve skin, just because she has to get something
3. I want a skin that accentuates her thematic, not go against it
4. Reworked skins don't count as "new" skins

Also just because they can fit Super Galaxy with a little elbow grease doesn't mean something like Elderwood or Blood Moon is impossible. I would love to see that Elderwood skin, I personally LOVE when characters have hoods like Lamb does.
